#summary The rel="archives" attribute indicates that the referenced document describes a collection of records, documents, or other materials of historical interest.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-whatwg

`rel="archives"` is one of several [LinkTypes link types] for describing relationships between documents.

== Usage ==

== Elements ==

You can use the `rel="archives"` attribute on these elements:

  * [LinkElement <link>]

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* ||
